anonymous_explanation:
To guarantee privacy, no data is stored or sent over the internet. 

This app converts your data into a Participant Id without any of it leaving your device. Nobody but you will ever find out what you have entered.

You can even turn off your internet access while using the app to be extra safe.
birthday_explanation: If you cannot answer this question, please select January 1st of the most likely birth year.
dominant_hand_explanation: If you cannot answer this question, please select "{}".
dominant_hand_question:
Which is your dominant hand (i.e., the one you hold a pen with):
The left or the right hand?
first_word_question: What was your first word as a child?
first_word_explanation: If you cannot answer this question, please enter an "X".
long_finger_explanation: If you cannot answer this question, please select "{}".
long_finger_question:
Which finger on your left hand is longer:
The ring finger or the index finger?
md5_explanation:
To safeguard your data, we employ the industry-standard encryption method MD5. MD5 is a widely used cryptographic hash function that converts your information into a unique alphanumeric string. It ensures that your data remains confidential and tamper-proof.

It's important to note that once your information is encrypted, the resulting hash is irreversible. This means that the original data cannot be derived from the hash. There is no way to reverse-engineer the original data from the hash.
mother_maiden_name_question: What is/was your mother's maiden name?
mother_maiden_name_explanation:
The maiden name is the family name/surname she was born with.

If you cannot answer this question, please enter an "X".
older_siblings_explanation:
Please count all older siblings you have ever had.

If you cannot answer this question, please select "0".
older_siblings_question: How many OLDER siblings do/did you have?
open_source_explanation:
This app is fully open-source, and the entire codebase is available for public scrutiny on GitHub!

This means you have the freedom to review, inspect, and verify the code yourself to gain confidence in its security and reliability.
reproducible_stable_explanation:
The same inputs will always produce the same Participant Id, and we explicitly selected all questions to have stable answers over time for adults.

You don't need to remember your Id because you, and only you, can re-generate it anytime.
short_description: Use personal information to generate an anonymous, secure, and stable Participant Id.
